summary: A group of college friends are attacked by a giant, man-eating crocodile while on spring break.
cast: Mark McLachlan|Caitlin Martin|Chris Solari|D.W. Reiser|Julie Mintz|Sommer Knight|Rhett Wilkins|Greg Wayne|Harrison Young|Terrence Evans|Vern Crofoot|Larry Udy|Adam Gierasch|Kip Addotta|Crystal Atkins|Mark A. Watters|Miles|Chris Innis|James McAuley
title: Cocodrilo
